geometry::strategy::distance::vincenty

geometry::strategy::distance::vincenty< P1, P2 > Class Template Reference

Distance calculation formulae on latlong coordinates, after Vincenty, 1975. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename P1, typename P2 = P1>
class geometry::strategy::distance::vincenty< P1, P2 >

Distance calculation formulae on latlong coordinates, after Vincenty, 1975.

Template parameters:
  • P1 first point type
  • P2 optional second point type
Author:
See http://www.ngs.noaa.gov/PUBS_LIB/inverse.pdf

Adapted from various implementations to get it close to the original document

  • http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/LatLongVincenty.html
  • http://exogen.case.edu/projects/geopy/source/geopy.distance.html
  • http://futureboy.homeip.net/fsp/colorize.fsp?fileName=navigation.frink
Examples:

2_point_ll_example.cpp, and 5_distance_example.cpp.
